section.title: SYSTEM::SUBSYSTEMS::ALLOCATION::PageHeader Struct Reference

para.para: header inserted onto a allocation allocated with the physical allocator. is in the beginning of the first page of the allocation. do not rely on its internal layout (for byte wise access)

listitem.para: default to zero for error catching
pointer to the usable area. this is used for error checking
